title.rendered: NFTs: what they really are and what they are being used for

content.rendered:
We are seeing how both anonymous and some personalities well-known are filling social networks with their acquisitions of illustrations of cats, monkeys or penguins. This, which is apparently just a drawing, what is behind it is a real business that moves hundreds of thousands and millions of dollars.

From NBA figures like Stephen Curry to TV or movie stars, all of them are doing really high investments in NFTs.

That avatar of a monkey with a certain attribute, such as a hat or glasses, makes it more or less weird. Based on it, its value increases or decreases.

But not everything is illustrations: it should be remembered that all this applies to any digital good that occurs to you It even turns things like a video, a tweet or memesomething that would seem impossible to sell.

But the keyword is “invest”, since it is not just another rarity of people with money, but there are a whole business behind. These pieces, like a physical work of art, are revalued over time and, as they are limitedthey also do it depending on the scarcity principle.
